info.title: experience
info.description: Hello, I'm Justin Pham, a third-year software engineering student with a passion for web development. My coding journey began when I was first introduced to Python in my freshman year of university. I immediately showed interest in being able to write robust and beautiful code. In the future, I hope I can find an exciting career in web-development where I can tackle challenging problems and come up with creative solutions.
